footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Ganyu | Update Date: 10/09/2022 | Editor: ChrӨma#3489

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Amos' Bow__
Provides an enormous amount of DMG% bonus to Charged Attacks. 3 stacks of its passive are guaranteed on her Bloom damage.

__Prototype Crescent R5__
Assuming she can hit a weakpoint, this bow is competitive with her 5* bows.

__Hamayumi R5__
A reliable source of DMG boost on normal and charge attacks, buff is further increase by 100% when burst energy is 100.

**Early Game Option:**
__Sharpshooter's Oath__
Hits on weakspots are guaranteed to CRIT. Thus, no CRIT Rate is necessary if you're an aim god.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Aqua Simulacra__

__Thundering Pulse__
Excellent unconditional weapon for DPS capability. Its passive is largely wasted due to it providing Normal Attack DMG.

__Polar Star__
Conditionally excellent if Ganyu stacks its passive by weaving in a Normal Attack before her DPS window (ie. N1EC+).

__Skyward Harp__

The Viridescent Hunt, Blackcliff Warbow and Hamayumi R5 are all very viable.

fields.value: <sands> ATK%/EM |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG
